description: Ensures settings on a filesystem using the type & provider

fs_type.description: The file system type. eg. ext3.

mkfs_cmd.description: Command to use to create the file system. Defaults to mkswap for fs_type=swap, otherwise mkfs.{{fs_type}}

options.description: Params for the mkfs command. eg. -l internal,agcount=x

initial_size.description: Initial size of the filesystem, Used only for resource creation, when using this option Puppet will not manage or maintain the size. To resize filesystems see the size property. AIX only.

size.description: Configures the size of the filesystem.  Supports filesystem resizing.  The size will be rounded up to the nearest multiple of the partition size. AIX only.

ag_size.description: Specify the allocation group size in megabytes, AIX only.

large_files.description: Large file enabled file system.  AIX only

compress.description: Data compression, LZ or no. AIX only

frag.description: JFS fragment size in bytes. AIX only

logname.description: Configure the log logical volume. AIX only

logsize.description: Size for an inline log in MB, AIX only

maxext.description: Size of a file extent in file system blocks, AIX only

agblksize.description: JFS2 block size in bytes, AIX only

extended_attributes.description: Format to be used to store extended attributes. AIX only

encrypted.description: Specify and encrypted filesystem. AIX only

isnapshot.description: Specify whether the filesystem supports internal snapshots, AIX only

mount_options.description: Specify the options to be passed to the mount command. AIX only

vix.description: Specify that the file system can allocate inode extents smaller than the default, AIX only

log_partitions.description: Specify the size of the log logical volume as number of logical partitions, AIX only

nodename.description: Specify the remote host where the filesystem resides. AIX only

accounting.description: Specify accounting subsystem support, AIX only

mountgroup.description: Mount group for the filesystem, AIX only

atboot.description: Specify whether the file system is mounted at boot time, AIX only

perms.description: Permissions for the filesystem, AIX only

device.description: Device to create the filesystem on, this can be a device or a logical volume. AIX only

volume_group.description: Volume group that the file system should be greated on. AIX only.
